problem_text: 21.90. Let Γ be a graph of diameter d. For i ∈ {1, 2, . . . , d}, let Γ_i be the graph on the same vertex set as Γ with vertices u, w adjacent in Γ_i if and only if d_Γ(u, w) = i. Does there exist a Q-polynomial distance-regular graph Γ of diameter 3 such that Γ_2 and Γ_3 are strongly regular? A. A. Makhn¨ev
